headline.seo: A Ban on Toys With Fast-Food Meals for Children
headline.print_headline: Citing Obesity of Children, County Bans Fast-Food Toys
headline.main: Citing Obesity of Children, County Bans Fast-Food Toys

docs.lead_paragraph: Citing the rate of obesity among its children and a desire that children eat healthier food, a California county board of supervisors enacted a ban on the toys.
docs.snippet: Citing the rate of obesity among its children and a desire that children eat healthier food, a California county board of supervisors enacted a ban on the toys.

headline.main: NBC Is Upfront About Returning to a Traditional Upfront

docs.abstract: After two years of experimenting with different ways to woo advertisers and agencies ahead of the coming fall TV season, NBC is reassuring Madison Avenue that it is returning to the tried-and-true rituals of the so-called upfront week.
docs.lead_paragraph: After two years of experimenting with different ways to woo advertisers and agencies ahead of the coming fall TV season, NBC is reassuring Madison Avenue that it is returning to the tried-and-true rituals of the so-called upfront week.
docs.snippet: After two years of experimenting with different ways to woo advertisers and agencies ahead of the coming fall TV season, NBC is reassuring Madison Avenue that it is returning to the tried-and-true rituals of the so-called upfront week.

headline.print_headline: Wealth and Tradition Pull Qatar Toward Unhealthy Choices
headline.main: Privilege Pulls Qatar Toward Unhealthy Choices

docs.lead_paragraph: Native Qataris are suffering serious health problems that relate to a privileged lifestyle paid for with the nation’s oil wealth.
docs.snippet: Native Qataris are suffering serious health problems that relate to a privileged lifestyle paid for with the nation’s oil wealth.

headline.print_headline: The Claim: Lack of Sleep Increases Weight.
headline.main: The Claim: Lack of Sleep Increases Weight

docs.lead_paragraph: Looking to lose a little weight? Portion size and exercise are crucial. But don’t forget about a good night’s rest.
docs.snippet: Looking to lose a little weight? Portion size and exercise are crucial. But don’t forget about a good night’s rest.

headline.seo: Caring for Hips and Knees to Avoid Artificial Joints
headline.print_headline: Save a Knee or Hip, Save Money (and Avoid Pain)
headline.main: Caring for Hips and Knees to Avoid Artificial Joints

docs.lead_paragraph: If your crucial joints are still intact, or just beginning to creak, here are some ways to keep osteoarthritis — and the cost of hip or knee replacement — at bay.
docs.snippet: If your crucial joints are still intact, or just beginning to creak, here are some ways to keep osteoarthritis — and the cost of hip or knee replacement — at bay.

headline.main: Is All That Sitting Really Killing Us?

docs.abstract: Are those perfect chairs just making us stay still for longer periods?
docs.lead_paragraph: Yes, we all sit too much, but will our sedentary ways reduce our lifespans? Olivia Judson, in a recent online Op-Ed column in The Times, told readers to "Stand Up While You Read This," and an article in The Times's business section reviewed different models of standing desks.
docs.snippet: Are those perfect chairs just making us stay still for longer periods?

docs.abstract: Can an industry that makes it money selling highly processed food also come up with the solution to the problem of obesity?
docs.lead_paragraph: Two articles in the current American Journal of Public Health (links via Marion Nestle's piece here) discuss the potentially constructive role of Big Food in improving global diet.
docs.snippet: Can an industry that makes it money selling highly processed food also come up with the solution to the problem of obesity?
